Edit.Name: prpBallastPercent
Edit.Caption: Ballast
Edit.Help: Ballast of the glider. Increase this value if the pilot/cockpit load is greater than the reference pilot weight of the glide polar (typically 75kg). Press ENTER on this field to toggle count-down of the ballast volume according to the dump rate specified in the configuration settings.

Edit.Name: prpBugs
Edit.Caption: Clean
Edit.Help: How clean the glider is. Set to 100% for clean, lower numbers as the wings pick up bugs or get wet. 50% indicates the glider's sink rate is doubled.

Edit.Name: prpQNH
Edit.Caption: QNH
Edit.Help: Area pressure for barometric altimeter calibration. This is set automatically if Vega connected.

Edit.Name: prpTemperature
Edit.Caption: Max Temp
Edit.Help: Set to forecast ground temperature. Used by convection estimator (temperature trace page of Analysis dialog)
